docs.text: Template repository for Physics and Mathematics problems Technical setup Install Visual Studio Code from here Install folowing extensions in Visual Studio Code: Github Repositories (GitHub, Inc.) GitHub Copilot (GitHub Copilot) GitHub Actions (GitHub, Inc.) Python (Microsoft) How to use this repository Below are the steps you need to follow: Create a GitHub account if you don’t have one. Fork this repository to your account. Enable the Issues tab: Go to the Settings tab and check the Issues option. Add your professor as a collaborator: Go to the Settings tab and add their GitHub username in the Collaborators section. Source Code & WWW GitHub repo WWW Where can I find the problems? Please visit the Physics 2025 Problems website.
